  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  bitri(wcel(c0, ccauold), wa(wf(c0, cn, chba), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccauold, co(chba, cmap, cn), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0))))))
  ralbidv(s0, crp, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0)))))
  rexralbidv(s1, s2, cn, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0)))
  breq1d(cfv(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0), cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cno, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s2))
  df-hcau(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cn, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))), clt, cv(s0))))), wf(c0, cn, chba))

thm hcau(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Cauchy ↔((c0 : ℕ → ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ Cauchy, ((c0 : ℕ → ~H)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0)))), (c0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0)))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccauold, (~H[↦]ℕ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((hs0 ` s1)[-h](hs0 ` s2)))[<]s0))))
  ralbidv(s0, crp, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((hs0 ` s1)[-h](hs0 ` s2)))[<]s0)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0)))
  rexralbidv(s1, s2, cn, (ℤ≥ ` s1), hs0 = c0, (normh `((hs0 ` s1)[-h](hs0 ` s2)))[<]s0, (normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0)
  breq1d((normh `((hs0 ` s1)[-h](hs0 ` s2))), clt, s0, (normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2))), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cno, ((hs0 ` s1)[-h](hs0 ` s2)), ((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((hs0 ` s1), cmv, (hs0 ` s2), (c0 ` s1), (c0 ` s2), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s1)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s2)
  df-hcau(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  anbi1i(c0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0))), (c0 : ℕ → ~H))
  elmap(c0, chba, cn)
  ax-hilex()
  nnex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((~H[↦]ℕ))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s1),(normh `((c0 ` s1)[-h](c0 ` s2)))[<]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm hcaucvg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccauold), wcel(c1, crp)), wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccauold), wcel(c1, crp), wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, c1))), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, cv(hs0))))))

  hcau(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  rspccva(hs0, crp, c1, wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, c1))))
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, cn, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, c1))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cn, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cno, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, c1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm hcaucvg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Cauchy ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ Cauchy, c1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]hs0))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ Cauchy, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]hs0))), (c0 : ℕ → ~H))
  hcau(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  rspccva(hs0, crp, c1, ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]c1)))
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, cn, (ℤ≥ ` s0), hs0 = c1, (normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]hs0, (normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]c1)
  breq2(hs0, c1, (normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1))), clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ ℕ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(normh `((c0 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s1)))[<]c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: seq1hcau
blocks.content: A sequence on a Hilbert space is a Cauchy sequence if it converges. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: hlimi
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of vector sequence ` F ` in a Hilbert space is ` A ` , i.e. ` F ` converges to ` A ` . This means that for any real ` x ` , no matter how small, there always exists an integer ` y ` such that the norm of any later vector in the sequence minus the limit is less than ` x ` . Definition of converge in [Beran] p. 96. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  bi2anan9(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wf(cv(hs0), cn, chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba), wf(c0, cn, chba), wcel(c1, chba))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: hlimadd
blocks.content: Limit of the sum of two sequences in a Hilbert vector space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hlimadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), cn, c3, chba, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), cn, c4, chba, w0)
  hvaddcl(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)))

  nnex()

  ssbri(c3, chli, c1, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv))))
  syl(w0, wbr(c4, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv))), c2), wbr(c4, chli, c2))
  ssbri(c4, chli, c2, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv))))

  resss(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv))), co(chba, cmap, cn))

  vacn(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno), cva, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv)), ccom(cno, cmv))
  hhva(cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  bitri(wbr(c0, chli, co(c1, cva, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv))), co(c1, cva, c2))), wbr(c0, cres(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, ccom(cno, cmv))), co(chba, cmap, cn)), co(c1, cva, c2)))

  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>v](c1[+h]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 : ℕ → ~H))

  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c3 ` s0)[+h](c4 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0[~~>v](c1[+h]c2), c0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ), c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))](c1[+h]c2))

  ffvelrnda(s0, cn, c3, chba, w0)
  ffvelrnda(s0, cn, c4, chba, w0)
  hvaddcl((c3 ` s0), (c4 ` s0))
  elmap(c0, chba, cn)

  nnex()
  lmcn2(s0, c0, (MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)), c1, cva, c2, cn, nat1, (MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)), chba, (MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)), chba, c3, c4, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)

  ssbri(c3, chli, c1, (~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))))
  syl(w0, c4[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))]c2, c4[~~>v]c2)
  ssbri(c4, chli, c2, (~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))))
  eqsstri(chli, (~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))), ((~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))|`(~H[↦]ℕ)))
  resss((~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))), (~H[↦]ℕ))
  mp1i(w0, +h ∈(((MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))[tX](MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))[Cn](MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))), < < +h, .h >, normh > ∈ NrmCVec)
  vacn(< < +h, .h >, normh >, cva, (MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)), (normh ∘ -h))
  hhva(< < +h, .h >, normh >)
  bitri(c0[~~>v](c1[+h]c2), (c0 ∈(~H[↦]ℕ)∧ c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))](c1[+h]c2)), c0[((~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))|`(~H[↦]ℕ))](c1[+h]c2))
  breqi(c0, chli, (c1[+h]c2), ((~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))|`(~H[↦]ℕ)))
  h2hlm((MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)), < < +h, .h >, normh >, (normh ∘ -h))
  hhnv(< < +h, .h >, normh >)
  df-hba()
  hhims((normh ∘ -h), < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  eqid(< < +h, .h >, normh >)
  eqid((normh ∘ -h))
  eqid((MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h)))
  brresi(c0, (~~>t `(MetOpen `(normh ∘ -h))), (~H[↦]ℕ), (c1[+h]c2))
  ovex(c1, cva, c2)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
